traits.Charge: If the unicorn moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15+1d6 + 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
traits.Magic Resistance: The unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Magic Weapons: The unicorn's weapon attacks are magical.

options.Hooves: The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.
options.Shimmering Shield (Costs 2 Actions): The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.
options.Heal Self (Costs 3 Actions): The unicorn magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points.
